item.description: Let's have a discussion where we speak in Arabic only. We should tell about where our favorite city is and why. The volcabulary should have lots of descriptive words about what you like about your favorite city. This can be a city you have visited, have lived in, or dream of visiting. You should anticipate talking for about 5 minutes on this topic and answers questions for about 5 minutes on this topic. That evening, I will distribute some volcabulary words that we can share and use throughout the evening. We can vote on the next topic for the next dinner. Our last dinner was a great success so I hope you attend this one too.
item.name: Arabic Language Practice and Dinner
